dialogue_text: It's been a while since I've had anyone to talk to... I think I've lost the taste for it honestly, so I'll make this brief.
There were others before you, but they've all either passed on or gone mad. I've watched it all for a decade now. Or maybe two decades, I'm not sure.
And secondly, I suppose you'll want to know where you are. Am I right?
Well, I don't know. I can't remember how I ended up here, or where I was going. You know, before. Nobody can.
But you've got a choice. I've made mine.
I was holding onto this, just in case. You should take it, I don't need it anymore.
Now leave me alone, please. I need time to think. To remember.
